Frequently Asked Questions

What is global connect Seller Center?

Global connect Seller Center is an online platform where sellers can register, list their products, and manage their sales on Jumia's e-commerce marketplace. It provides tools for order processing, inventory tracking, and analytics.

How do I register as a seller?

Registering as a seller on Jumia is easy and free. Visit global connect Seller Center, fill out the form, and follow the instructions to activate your account.

Are there fees for selling on global connect?

Global connect charges commissions on successful sales, with rates varying by product category. Additional fees may apply for promotions or using Jumia's fulfillment services.
